title: (x) Kylie font? - ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates {Adriano S}
content:
Hi you guys,   
   
You've never let me down in the past but I'm looking for the font used on Kylie's new album, BODY LANGUAGE. I know it's a variation on the font used for her FEVER album (i.e. Avant Garde) but does anyone know its exact name and where I can download it?   
   
Many many thanks!!!   
Graham S   
   
 ![Kylie Body Language Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20090519191241im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23908.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: The proper name I guess would be ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates, but I don't know if they're available in digital form anymore.

There is a site in Austria or is it Austrailia but it doesn't seem to have a place you can buy the font.   
   
Is it me or is that some of the worst typesetting I've ever seen.
Yeah... it's not very good, is it?
Adriano, I don't know how old you are but you should have seen the Lubalin years where everone wanted minus leading and tracking that ran everything together. I call it blob type
I'm young but I've seen some of that. Can't say it does anything for me (and I could group that with the tDR school of negatively tracked Helvetica Neue...).
